member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the car ticket.
member.returns: The price of the car ticket.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of the vehicle.
member.returns: A string indicating the vehicle type ("Car").

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.MC.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the motorcycle ticket.
member.returns: The price of the motorcycle ticket.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.MC.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of the vehicle.
member.returns: A string indicating the vehicle type ("MC").

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Licenseplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the license plate of the vehicle. The license plate must not be longer than 7 characters.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date associated with the vehicle.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the vehicle.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of the vehicle.
member.returns: A string indicating the vehicle type.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.BrobizzUsed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Brobizz is used.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle.ApplyBrobizzDiscount(System.Double)
member.summary: Applies a 5% discount to the price if Brobizz is used.
member.returns: The price after applying the Brobizz discount.
